page.title: 12HOUSING.
page.content: The centre of Chorley and Coppull is mainly low-rise terrace housing.Since the mid-l960's,estates of semi and detached houses have been built on the fringes of both towns.There has been a policy of rejuvenation and clearance of Victorian housing in the centres and open spaces have been landscaped.In l970 Chorley became part of Central Lancs New Town.Motorway and rail links were meant to attract new industry and 72,000 new properties were to be built overall.Farm land has been used at Eaves Green for low density housing as part of this plan.Terrace house prices in the block start at l0,000 pounds + and new 2 bedroom semis from l9,000 pounds plus.
